edu.vserver.exercises.helpers
Class MutableExecutionState

java.lang.Object
  edu.vserver.exercises.helpers.MutableExecutionState
All Implemented Interfaces:
ExecutionState, java.io.Serializable
public class MutableExecutionState
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExecutionState

A mutable implementator for the ExecutionState -interface.

This class is useful for keeping track of the present execution-state.

Changing some of the variables of this class does not tricker any event in itself, but the class using this class must inform registered listeners at an appropriate time about the changes by calling their #actOnStateChange(ExecutionState) -methods with this object (or any other implementor of ExecutionState derived from it) as an argument.

Author:
Riku Haavisto
See Also:
